body_html:
Yes, documentation contributions welcome.
…
On Apr 12, 2017 1:50 AM, "Richard Davies" ***@***.***> wrote: I notice that a very similar code change to @kevin-keraudren <https://github.com/kevin-keraudren>'s suggestion was actually later committed by @nealwu <https://github.com/nealwu> in tensorflow/models#934 <tensorflow/models#934> But the documentation change to force new instance creation in MultiRNNCell in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/ tensorflow/docs_src/tutorials/recurrent.md hasn't been made. Should it be? — You are receiving this because you were assigned. Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub <#5599 (comment)>, or mute the thread <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/ABtim-VBIA0Mvgd9vO-3IrE89kgPaywcks5rvJBPgaJpZM4Kxfkq> .
body_text:
Yes, documentation contributions welcome.
…
On Apr 12, 2017 1:50 AM, "Richard Davies" ***@***.***> wrote:
 I notice that a very similar code change to @kevin-keraudren
 <https://github.com/kevin-keraudren>'s suggestion was actually later
 committed by @nealwu <https://github.com/nealwu> in tensorflow/models#934
 <tensorflow/models#934>

 But the documentation change to force new instance creation in
 MultiRNNCell in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/
 tensorflow/docs_src/tutorials/recurrent.md hasn't been made. Should it be?

 —

body:
Yes, documentation contributions welcome.

On Apr 12, 2017 1:50 AM, "Richard Davies" <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> I notice that a very similar code change to @kevin-keraudren
> <https://github.com/kevin-keraudren>'s suggestion was actually later
> committed by @nealwu <https://github.com/nealwu> in tensorflow/models#934
> <https://github.com/tensorflow/models/pull/934>
>
> But the documentation change to force new instance creation in
> MultiRNNCell in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/
> tensorflow/docs_src/tutorials/recurrent.md hasn't been made. Should it be?
>
> —
